title: How to clear the database？
body:
Thank you for providing such a convenient tool！But I have some questions, looking forward to your reply.
1、Why do deleted project documents still exist in the database?How do I empty the database every time I create a new project?
2、An error occurred while calling the API interface to upload the file, But the document appears in the database in the Doccano instance。How can I solve it?
3、Can the path to the API interface to download the document be changed?How to operate it?
